name: authenticator
description: * An Oauth2 authentication application. Express skeleton using the [Express Generator](https://expressjs.com/en/starter/generator.html).  * Oauth 2 implemented by following [tutorial 1](https://blog.cloudboost.io/how-to-make-an-oauth-2-server-with-node-js-a6db02dc2ce7) and [tutorial 2](https://blog.logrocket.com/implementing-oauth-2-0-in-node-js/).
